lost-art.name: The Lost Art of Armor Crafting
lost-art.description: Acquire a consumable that unlocks the first collection for the Envoy Legenday Armor

instructions.description: Collect from a boss chest after completing any raid boss OR from Strike Mission: Old Lion's Court(CM).

envoy-armor-1.name: Collection: Envoy Armor I: Experimental Armor
envoy-armor-1.description: Collect items to complete the first collection, and gain an ascended armor set.

envoy-armor-2.name: Envoy Armor II: Refined Armor
envoy-armor-2.description: Collect items to complete the second collection, and gain a precursor armor set.

infused-living-crystal.name: Infused Living Crystal
infused-living-crystal.description: Acquire a Living Crystal from the Earth Elemental in the Tangled Depths and use it to capture energy left over in the pillars after defeating the Vale Guardian in Spirit Vale.
instructions: Go to the Ley-Line Confluence Waypoint â€” [&BPUHAAA=] in Tangled Depths.
Head north towards Nuchoch Lane, and follow the ledge on the right until you find an opening.
Follow the path to an updraft, then take two more updrafts to end up on a platform with some Veteran Earth Elementals. You may have to wait upto 30 minutes for them to spawn.
Kill the earth Elementals and an opening will appear. Go through it to face another elemental.
After killing the elemental collect a Living Crystal from the Whitebear's Pride II Strongbox.
